</title>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 103 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 70,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Constructed of dull gray metal, this [breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10) is decorated with the symbol of a craggy black mountaintop. This breastplate functions as a _+3 [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) breastplate_. When you're [Shoved](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) or otherwise [forced to move](/Rules.aspx?ID=451), you can reduce the amount you move by up to 10 feet. When you invest the breastplate, you either increase your Constitution score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever is higher.
